Text: RE Daily UpdateFrom Ken Lay Chairman of the NRON I know it is discouraging to read the negative media coverage about our company On a positive note there was an editorial in last Sundays Houston Chronicle that I want you to read csCDAstoryhtseditorialoutlook This is an extremely difficult time for everyone and I appreciate everything you do for Enron Thank you for pointing out this inspiring article Sincerely yours binkley B K Oxley binkley Manager Software Engineering Enron Broadband Services MS Smith Street Houston TX mailto Cell Office ICQ
